CustomObject.description: Records of the Custom Metadata Type drive the behavior of the vccExternalVaLinks lightning web component. the "vcc" prefix has been deliberately omitted, as part of a coordinated effort to build a Global Dynamic Links component. The vccExternalVaLinks component is slated for deprecation, and this MDT will survive to drive the behavior of the generic "ExternalVALinks" lightning web component.
CustomObject.label: External VA Link
